- Links to external files shown in two columns.

screen.title: Column descriptions are displayed as infotip
screen.subtitle:
- Column descriptions have been set in createdb01.sql. No description is shown where the value from the table has been modified in the SELECT statement (example1, example2).
- Demonstration of multi-column view. A label can be omitted. Values are shown in the same column until a new column is triggered.
screen.query: SELECT "test1".*, "test1"."value" AS "value 1", "test2"."value" AS "value 2", "A"."value" AS "value 3", "B"."value" AS "value 4", 'no description here - ' || "B"."value" AS "example1", upper("test1"."value") AS "example2" FROM "TestCSV"."test1" LEFT JOIN "TestCSV"."test2" ON "test1"."id" = "test2"."id" LEFT JOIN "TestCSV"."test3" AS "A" ON "test1"."id" = "A"."id" LEFT JOIN "TestCSV"."test4" AS "B" ON "test1"."id" = "B"."id"
